pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generate Visual Predictive Checks (VPC) Using 'shiny' // Utilize the 'shiny' interface to parameterize a Visual Predictive Check (VPC), including selecting from different binning or binless methods and performing stratification, censoring, and prediction correction. Generate the underlying 'tidyvpc' and 'ggplot2' code directly from the user interface and download R or Rmd scripts to reproduce the VPCs in R.
